net.sf.sprockets.view

Class TranslateImagePageChangeListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.SimpleOnPageChangeListener
      • net.sf.sprockets.view.TranslateImagePageChangeListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener, ObservableImageView.ImageViewObserver

    public class TranslateImagePageChangeListener
extends ViewPager.SimpleOnPageChangeListener
implements ObservableImageView.ImageViewObserver
    Scales an image so that both dimensions fill its ImageView (similar to CENTER_CROP) and then translates the image when a ViewPager is scrolled to reveal the "cropped" portion. The start of the image is visible on the first page, the middle of the image is progressively visible while scrolling through the middle page(s), and the end of the image is visible on the last page.

    If the Drawable source of the ImageView changes (e.g. by calling setImage* after asynchronous loading), this class must be notified so that it can scale and translate the new Drawable. This can be done automatically by using an ObservableImageView or manually by calling onDrawableChanged().

    Sample Usage

    Sample Layout

    Since:
    2.1.0
